name: readeck
tagline: A self-hosted read it later and bookmarking tool
description: Readeck is a self-hosted bookmarking and read-it-later tool. It supports importing, tagging, and organizing articles with a distraction-free reading mode.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize bookmarks with tags for easy filtering and discovery

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find saved articles by searching through titles, content, and tags

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Migrate existing bookmarks from Pocket, Instapaper, or browser exports

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Access saved articles without an internet connection after initial download

features.title: Archive Management
features.description: Mark articles as read or archive them to keep your reading list organized
